Notes: The archives preserves the records, photographs, and artifacts of the Archdiocese of San Antonio that reflect the work of the Church, its people and institutions from 1703 to present. The records include administrative records, sacramental records from 1703 to the present; bishops and archbishop papers; priest papers; Catholic newspapers from 1892 to present; and closed catholic school and orphanage records. Restrictions may apply to some collections.
